page.title: 17FARMING.
page.content: There are{17}major farms in our block and{4}of these together total 970 acres,divided into over 100 fields. These are mixed farms growing Barley, Wheat and supporting{200}dairy cows. The milk goes to Stonehouse dairy. Between them they have{150}Beef cattle. There are two large fruit farms one specialising in the production of cider apples sent to Bulmers at Hereford and other soft fruit drinks, and the other farm in soft fruit production -rasberries,strawberries for retail.All farms have tractors, trailers, mowers and spinners.The problems with the land are:-The soil is to sandy,several banks, many irregular shaped fields, very hungry soil, and too much gradient for Arable farming.
